modName: HDT and Bodyslide CBBE conversion for jmenaru's Scarlet Dawn Armor
summary: This is a conversion of jmenaru's Scarlet Dawn armor to HDT PE and Bodyslide for CBBE.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]What is this?
[/size][size=3]This is a conversion of jmenaru's Scarlet Dawn armor to HDT PE and Bodyslide.


[size=5]Requirements
[/size][/size]SKSE v1.7.1 [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/][u]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/u][/url]
Realistic Ragdolls and Force - realistic force [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/601/][u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/601/[/u][/url]
XPMS Extended  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/][u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/[/u][/url]
HDT Physics Extensions v14.28 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/][u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/[/u][/url]
The original mod by jmenaru [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50814/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50814/[/url]
Bodyslide  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/][u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/[/u][/url]
CBBE  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/][u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/[/u][/url]

[size=5]Installation
[/size][size=3]Install with NMM as long as you have your Caliente Tools folder in your data folder and it contains Bodyslide.
Otherwise download manually and install in the appropriate Bodyslide folders.
Build the armors in bodyslide.

[size=5]Things to know

[size=3]There may be some clipping with certain animations or poses, I tried to account for as much as possible.
If you notice anything let me know and if I can reasonably fix it I will.
[/size]
[size=3]Should you need assistance with installing the HDT body or creating an HDT body I will try to help you to the best of my abilities.
Resources and advice should be available on the Bodyslide mod page.

I tried to accommodate for Knightmare077's regular HDT xml file and collision as much as possible.

Pay attention to any skeleton altering mods you may have installed, they may interfere with the skeleton required to make HDT work.

The correct skeleton you should get by installing Realistic Ragdolls and Force first.
Then XPMS Extended, let XPMS Extended overwrite Realistic Ragdolls and Force.

HDT Physics you should get by installing SKSE 1.7.1, look at Gophers videos for proper installation.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=37xAMUQc1oY&list=PL96C073B0B8BFC01D&index=102][u]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=37xAMUQc1oY&list=PL96C073B0B8BFC01D&index=102[/u][/url]
[/size][size=3]The video contains other things, so be patient, even though it mentions SKSE v1.7.0 it is valid for 1.7.1 regarding the memory blocks.
HDT Physics Extensions is an SKSE plugin, so that is why you need SKSE.

This mod works great with this conversion [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57859/][u][color=#0066cc]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57859/[/color][/u][/url]  .

[size=5]Credits

[/size][/size][size=3]Jmenaru for the original mod and kind permission for this conversion.
VRDaphni for testing, emotional support and gorgeous characters.
Jkrojmal for JK's Skyrim.
xbox2015, MallowsofInferno, Mythos214, Kitananji for armor retextures.
Caliente, ousnius and Jeir for CBBE and Bodyslide.
Groovtama for XPMS Extended.
dDefinder for Realistic Ragdolls and Force.
Gopher for being a teacher of the best kind.
Bethesda for the best....ish game ever made.

[size=5]My other conversions

[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59267/][u][color=#0066cc]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59267/[/color][/u][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59605/][u][color=#0066cc]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59605/[/color][/u][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61141/][u][color=#0066cc]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61141/[/color][/u][/url]
[/size][/size][/size]
author: Raisuli2013
